question: Name two ancient districts separated by Gravina in Matera, Italy.
asked_question_translated: NÃ¦vn to antikke distrikter adskilt af Gravina i Matera, Italien.
answer: De to antikke distrikter adskilt af Gravina i Matera i Italien er Sassi di Matera og Civita.
answer_translated_eng: The two ancient districts separated by Gravina in Matera, Italy are Sassi di Matera and Civita.
